reviews.review: Bish get the f*** out of my way simulator
Obviously fun and has great mechanics just like the original HL2, but I found this game WAY too short. Extremely unsatisfying, though luckily HL2:E2 kinda makes up for this.

Это просто пиз*ец, я проходил игру с Mmod ом и Cinimatic mod ом. В самом конце. где нужно сопровождать беженцов до поезда. Еб*чий Барни решил, что я бл*ть проводник еб*ный и вместо того, чтобы на третий раз пойти со мной, он бл*ть просто посылал этих даунов в паре. Бл*ть, я сопровождал их минут 30, потом понял, что что-то не так. Оху*нно бл*ть, Барни там походу тр*хался с кем-то, рождал этих еб*ных повстанцев и мне приходилось их постоянно сопровождать, а сам он просто стоял и смотрел. Просто ШЕДЕВР
10 "выводи их" из 10
P.S. Пришлось смотреть прохождение на ютубе
P.S.S. С*КА Я САМ ХОТЕЛ ПРОЙТИ

over all this is a great game i love it and i have been playing it sience i was little, i love it so much and the graphics are amazing dor 2004.  it was  the revalution of realistic physics in video games, ever sience its relese games started trying to do what hl2 did but notheing could beat the juggernaught! although it being verry good there are still some flaws and a few where fixed in the episodes, anyway some of the AI is kinda bugged out and the react kinda late with lines and its easy to get lost, espacialy when you are coming back to this game after a while, or even playing for the first time. overall i rate the game 9.3 out of 10 it is verry good with a couple of flaws, but thats all fine and dandy i hope you agree with me -ferrellcat

Eu não achei este episódio muito bom, eu consegui passá-lo todo mas acho que ele tem alguns erros, por exemplo, o facto da alyx ter uma arma boa e nós só termos uma que só podemos matar com objetos, e para ser sincero eu nas faces de batalha tambem achei a alyx um pouco burra, eu só espero que o episódio 2 seja bem melhor.
I highly recommend this game, especially when It's on sale!
HL2 EP1 è un gioco molto bello ma, rispetto ad HL2 è molto corto infatti io personalmente lo ho finito con 3 ore di gioco

Хоть и на дворе 2019, а как же хорош старый добрый HL2 и продолжение его, - Эпизод 1. Хоть он и не долгий, но очень интересен, с первых секунд уже интрига, в заставке того что же было после конца HL2. В общем что тут писать, здесь нужно только играть и кайфовать. 10 зомбайнов из 10
The weakest of the HL2 games, but not toooo bad

Ciddi anlamda oynarken 1 an bile sıkılmadım  tüm oyunlarını bir haftada bitirdiğim efsane oyun serisi. Hepinizin alıp bitirmesini tavsiye ederim, indirimlerde  bazı oyunları 1.85 bazı oyunları ise 1.05 tl oluyor  kesinlikle alıp bu efsane oyunu bitirmenizi tavsiye ederim. Ayrıca oyun half life 2 nin tam bittiği dakikada geçiyor half life 1 ile half life 2 nin hikayesinin arasında 20 yıl varken bu oyunla zaman farkı 1 dakika bile değil. Yani oyuna başlar başlamaz direk o oyuna devam ettiğinizi hissediyorsunuz.
Short game play, but still fun
Чем же интересна эта игра? Ну например тем что, это малое продолжение истории вселенной Half Life. Ничего не говоря о 2 эпизоде, это захватывающие 2 эпизода, которые вы должны сыграть!
Everyone interested in Half-Life should play this. Not as long as Half-Life 2, but will keep you immersed from start to finish.
Better than Episode 2 coz it has Barney in it, but Episode 2 has the strider battle, so the superiority of either episodes is debatable.
great game sadly thanos dies along with heavy from team fortress 2, truly a sad gamer moment
Such dark. Much creepy. Very zombine.
Fabuła tak samo świetna jak w głównej części Half Life 2
um dos meus jogos favoritos, excelente.
Short indeed, but filled with the action and all the stuff that was great about HL2. Still a good ride to this day

I feel like the episodic structure is pointless, mostly because they could be put together extremely easily into the third game. However, the level design in One and Two are still up to par to the ones in Half-Life 2, so I have to give it to them.
i died 5 times on the first level. thanks valve.
A short and sweet continuation of HL2 but not quite as good as Episode 2 in my opinion.

Jeśli mam być szczery to mnie boli,że ten Epizod ma jedynie "Bardzo Pozytywne" oceny. Dlaczego?Bo to więcej tego samego! Ta gra to mistrzostwo takie same jak jej poprzednik. Fabuła--Gordon Freeman wraz z Alyx wracają do Cytadeli, aby ustabilizować rdzeń oraz następnie uratować ludzi z City 17 przed implozją. Zalety niemalże te same--fabuła, klimat, dialogi, detale, broń, postacie, AI "ludzi", ikoniczne potwory, rozmaite zagadki, trudniejsze osiągnięcia, nie prowadzenie gracza za rączkę, a co za tym idzie ciągłość rozgrywki. Wady są dwie--brak możliwości celowania z przyłożenia oraz długość rozgrywki nieproporcjonalna do ceny. Reasumując--gra ta to mistrzostwo, lecz nieco mniejsze, zaś ja to polecam.
Самая короткая часть Half-life где нам показали  как все разебало!
Конечно, хуже чем просто Half-Life 2, но ради того что бы собрать все очивки потянет.

Half Life 2 Episode 1! Wow, not as good. It feels more like a Bridge that was made only to make more money and so the gap between HL2 and EP2 would be filled. Yeah... It's not that good, some good visuals but it's short and has no story.

4/10 Move on to the Next One.
A great game to follow up to HL2. if you have to pick out of the two episodes though. i advise you get the second one.

Half Life 2 


Demek en yorum yapılmayacak oyuna bir inceleme yapıyorum.Yani, bu oyun baştan çıkaran atmosferiyle, bizi soru işaretleri içinde bırakan sonra cevaplayıp sonra daha büyük soru işaretinde bırakan mükemmel hikayesi,ilerleme hissiyatı,mükemmel kurgulanmış ve içten seslendirilmiş karakterleri, taktik yapan düşmanları ile Half Life 2.Bence oynayıp oynayabileceğiniz en iyi oyun Half Life 2'dir.
Oynamadıysanız çok şey kaçırıyorsunuz.Yani bu yorumu okuduktan sonra ne yapıyorsanız bırakın, bu oyunu satın alıp oynayın. Kafanızda hiçbir şüphe olmasın oynadığınız en iyi oyun olmasa da oynadığınız en iyi oyunlardan bir tanesi olacaktır.
